creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Plain-weave heading on knotted fringe with tassels, fringe with warp-twined heading, Pieced, block-printed lining. The ground fabric is pieced from cotton flannel and cotton velvet dyed red and black. There is polychrome silk embridery and a cotton fringe. The backing is printed cotton fabric.
medium: Silk, cotton; chain stitch, detached chain stitch, cretan stitch, back stitch, open chain stitch
title: Tent hanging
